text: Plains is an unincorporated community in Marquette County in the U.S. state of Michigan. The community is located within Forsyth Township. As an unincorporated community, Plains has no legally defined boundaries or population statistics of its own. ==History== The community was named from its location on a plain. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Marquette County, Michigan Category:Unincorporated communities in Michigan
title: Plains, Michigan
